claim_text: YouTube outlier crawl every 6 hours at 00/06/12/18 KST.
notes: Doc notes KST assumption; crontab.example provides UTC-adjusted entries.

claim_text: TikTok outlier crawl every 4 hours at 00/04/08/12/16/20 KST.
notes: Doc notes KST assumption; crontab.example provides UTC-adjusted entries.

claim_text: Instagram outlier crawl every 12 hours at 06/18 KST.
notes: Doc notes KST assumption; crontab.example provides UTC-adjusted entries.

claim_text: Platform updates run daily at 09:00 KST.
notes: Doc notes KST assumption; crontab.example provides UTC-adjusted entries.

claim_text: Evidence loop trigger runs daily at 10:00 KST.
notes: Scheduled as 0 1 UTC (10:00 KST) in crontab.example.

claim_text: Cron uses python scripts/run_scheduled_crawl.py for outlier crawlers and platform updates.
notes: Cron expressions reference scripts/run_scheduled_crawl.py.

claim_text: Dockerfile.crawler runs python scripts/run_scheduled_crawl.py.
notes: Doc example uses existing scheduled crawl entrypoint.

claim_text: Env vars YOUTUBE_MIN_VIEWS, TIKTOK_MIN_VIEWS, INSTAGRAM_MIN_VIEWS, OUTLIER_MULTIPLIER_THRESHOLD are planned (not yet wired into crawlers).
notes: Docs now mark thresholds as planned.

claim_text: TikTok auto mode order: comment_list API -> Playwright DOM -> yt-dlp.
TIKTOK_MAX_COMMENTS/TIKTOK_TIMEOUT_MS/TIKTOK_MAX_RETRIES/TIKTOK_PROXY/TIKTOK_COOKIE_FILE/TIKTOK_COMMENTS_PROVIDER are supported.
Unified extractor tries UNIVERSAL_DATA JSON comments, then DOM, then dedicated extractor.
Standalone service exposes POST /extract and POST /metadata.
Outliers/remix call extract_best_comments(limit=10).
WebSocket URL is wss://<host>/api/v1/ws/coaching/{session_id}.
notes: Docs updated to /api/v1/ws/coaching/{session_id}.

claim_text: Query params output_mode/persona/language/voice_style are optional.
notes: Docs align with optional params and defaults.

claim_text: Personas are drill_sergeant, bestie, chill_guide, hype_coach (default chill_guide).
notes: Backend accepts persona aliases; default calm_mentor maps to chill_guide.

claim_text: Server sends feedback as feedback message type.
notes: Docs updated to feedback.

claim_text: Server sends session_status/graphic_guide/text_coach/audio_feedback/vdg_coaching_data/adaptive_response/signal_promotion/rule_update/pong/error.
GET /api/v1/outliers/items/pending-comments lists comment-review queue.
PATCH /api/v1/outliers/items/{id}/comments records manual comments.
POST /api/v1/outliers/items/{id}/approve triggers VDG analysis.
GET /api/v1/outliers/items?campaign_eligible=true lists campaign candidates.
notes: campaign_eligible filter added to list_outliers.

sync_outliers_to_sheet.py is used for DB -> Sheet sync.
Comment extraction priority: YouTube API -> yt-dlp, TikTok comment_list -> Playwright -> yt-dlp, Instagram yt-dlp.
Language priority: ko > en > others.
comments_missing_reason is recorded on failures.
